tool_description: Creates customized cover letters tailored to specific job applications using applicant information and job requirements.

applicant_name.description: Full name of the job applicant

company_name.description: Name of the company being applied to

job_title.description: Exact title of the position being applied for

key_qualifications.description: Top 3-5 qualifications that match the job requirements

relevant_experiences.description: Specific experiences to highlight in the cover letter

company_research.description: Information about company values, recent news, or culture

hiring_manager_name.description: Name of hiring manager if known

error_messages: Missing required information: applicant_name, company_name, and job_title are required.
Insufficient qualifications: Provide 3-5 key qualifications that match the job.
Insufficient experiences: Provide 2-4 relevant experiences to highlight.
Invalid tone: Use one of [professional, enthusiastic, conservative, creative].
Invalid word limit: Word limit must be between 150 and 500.
usage: Provide applicant details, job information, and key qualifications to generate a personalized cover letter that effectively communicates fit for the role.

word_count.description: Final word count of the generated cover letter

key_points_covered.description: Main selling points and qualifications highlighted in the letter

personalization_score.description: Level of customization and personalization achieved (0-100)
